Welcome to Commodity Price Coin

OUR MISSION

Commodity Price Coin to become the largest,
safest, and most accessible commodity marketplace an earth

OVERVIEW

Commodity Price Coin (CPC) is an international commodity marketplace and blockchain technology where physical commodites such as:

  • silver
  • gold
  • platinum
  • palladium
  • rhodium
  • osmium
  • holmium
  • rhenium
  • indium
  • ruthenium are traded
    using digital tokens

CPC tokens are used as the digital representation for 100% backed physical commodities. Commodity Price Coin will offer consumers the ability to exchange CPC tokens for physical commodities or conventional currencies through partner vendors worldwide.

SOLUTION TO CONTEMPORARY MARKET ISSUES

Converting Digital Assets
into physical assets:

CPC offers a simple and affordable way to transfer capital from cryptocurrency marketplaces into physical commodities.

Commodity Scalability:

CPC allows consumers the ability to purchase precious metal commodities in highly divisible and incremental units.

Marketplace Stability:

Through pegging and physical conversion capabilities, CPC provides perhaps the safest financial technology in the marketplace today.

Accountability:

CPC provides customers the option of face to face transactions and conversions in major cities worldwide

Utility and Purpose:

CPC not only acts as the vehicle to transfer the digital into the physical but also acts as the premier safeguard to volatility issues facing the marketplace.

INITIAL COIN OFFERING (ICO)

INITIAL COIN OFFERING (ICO)

Ico sale will consist of 10 x precious metal coins and 1 x utility token (cpc share).

Holmium Gold
Indium Palladium Platinum
Rhenium Rhodium Ruthenium
Silver Osmium

ULTILITY TOKENS (CPC SHARES)

  • CPC SHARES also act as the primary vehicle to trade commodities in digital and physical forms
  • Utility Tokens or (CPC SHARES) provide a dual purpose for consumers,CPC SHARES acts as a floating representation of the market value of the entity that is Commodity Price Coin.

CPC COMMODITY TOKENS

  • A CPC Commodity Token acts as a buy in for investors. Once a CPC share is purchased, customers can buy, sell, trade and exchange CPC precious metals.
  • Holders of CPC Commodity tokens will need to hold at least one utility token to redeem or transfer their commodity backed token.
  • To redeem commodity tokens holders must be in possession of enough utility tiken to complete transfer.
  • This stands for P2P digital trading as well. All transactions at ICO (Phase 3) and pre ICO (Phase 2) will be done using Ethereum.

RELEASE STAGES AND BENEFITS

  • 1ST INVESTMENT ROUND

    (2PRE ICO)

  • 2ND INVESTMENT ROUND

    (PRE ICO)

  • FINAL INVESTMENT ROUND

    (ICO)

PHASE ONE INVESTMENT STAGE:

  • CPC is offering limited release of 1,000,000 CPC share (ULTILITY TOKENS) equivalent to $500,000 USD
  • First round investors will receive a 100% bonus i.e. A purchase of $50,000 usd = 100,000 utility tokens
  • Upon full uptake of 1,000,000 Utility tokens (CPC Shares), Crycom Ltd will back initial investment with $250,000 worth of precious metals.
    (Backing will be spread evenly across 10 precious metals at $25,000 USD per commodity)

The Gold Standard in Pegged Crypto-Commodity Investments

PHASE TWO INVESTMENT STAGE:

  • Receive flat rate 35% bonus when participating in pre ICO.
  • Available to all pre approved and vetted investors.

The Gold Standard in Pegged Crypto-Commodity Investments

PHASE THREE INVESTMENT STAGE:

  • Receive up to 30% extra utility tokens when buying utility token in the ICO.
  • Purchase from 0 – 0.99999....Ether value = No Bonus
  • Purchase from 1- 4.99999.... Ether value = 10% Bonus
  • Purchase from 5 – 9.99999.... Ether Value = 20% Bonus
  • Purchase 10+ Ether = 30% Bonus
  • At ICO participants can choose to buy utility tokens on their own/ or in conjunction with CPC Commodity backed tokens.

The Gold Standard in Pegged Crypto-Commodity Investments
